nodes.title: [WIP] Add parsing to links to provide more context
Simplify regex when quoting with text
Only include text when selecting 'Quote Text'
Added what seems to be a working MD5 image search on archived.moe
Use FileProvider to open videos in external apps
Add images to ImageViewer while it is open
Set versionName in app.gradle from git tags instead of manual
Added proper back-press behaviour for cross-thread links
Setting to save images into a folder named the current board
Change the repliesTo for post from list -> set.
Change the captcha keyboard to textVisiblePassword
Use numeric keyboard for legacy CAPTCHA
Added optional dual/multi window for Samsung and LG devices
Disable autocorrect for legacy captcha input field
Add advanced option to reveal spoiler text
Add Reveal Image Spoilers in advanced options
Add ability to clear saved replies/reply history
Advanced option to show/hide Anonymous username
Album download to use saveOriginalFilename preference
Update the post_details_color so that it can be more easily seen on dark themes
Advanced video loading & FAB auto hiding
Added TinEye to image search menu
Add 'Open in browser' for posts and threads
Fixed '<>' operator is not allowed for source level below  1.7
Snackbar with undo button when you swipe away pins.
Some fixes and cleaning. Added sharing posts.
Material for the material design branch
Allow downloading of threads from thread view (without opening image view first)
Wrap pinned ListView around a parent View
Display message instead of ProgressBar when there is no thread specified
Advanced option for close/back buttons on the bottom.
Update httpclientandroidlib and manage android support with gradle
Added "(OP)" to the end of the quote link when its links to the OP
change jsoup lib with the one provided by maven central repo
Hide toolbar when opening an image and media loading option
error reporting: replace acra with sentry
#552, Add ability to copy file url by long click
#675, Use a better version of restartApp method that kills the app completely
#702, Automatically pause video when app goes to background
#422, Add split-screen flags to the manifest
#597, Fix webm audio control always showing up
#316, Disregard grid_card_margin when top view is PostStubCell
#709, Fix not working post sharing while being in the catalog
#434, Add ability to sort boards by code/name in ascending/descending order
#693, Add ability to change posting request timeout
#704, Change "scroll to post" action from regular click to long click
#700, Split nav post image goto not working
"Failed to load image" only on center image fix
#437, missing post date info and country code stuff
#524, Adds a post delay for 4chan, kinda hacky
#660, Adds a shitty (You) counter for shitty people
#354, Check whether the ImageViewerNavigationController is already shown
Add rotate options to image view
#599, fixes cross board links, adds structure for direct board links and board search links
#484, update pinned thread titles for newly posted threads when possible
#526, add 2 and 5 minute background interval times
Touch up and complete the current strings.
Simplify the project setup a little bit.
fixed always-open-in-browser to work with image menu
Added always open links with external browser option
Actually did something useful this time
updated build.gradle, dependencies, and other stuff
